title: Best practices for remote team collaboration
content:
After 3 years working remotely, I've learned that the key to effective collaboration is establishing clear communication protocols. Here's what works for my team:

1. **Async-first mindset** - Document decisions and discussions
2. **Regular sync meetings** - Weekly team standups keep us aligned
3. **Clear documentation** - Reduces back-and-forth questions
4. **Timezone awareness** - Schedule meetings that work for everyone
author: alex_chen

title: React 19 features you should know about
content: React 19 introduces several powerful features that improve developer experience. The new hooks API and improved error boundaries make error handling more intuitive. Server components also enable better performance optimization.
author: dev_sarah

title: My startup just raised Series A funding!
content: Excited to announce that our SaaS platform just closed a $5M Series A round! This funding will help us expand our team and accelerate product development. Special thanks to our amazing early users and investors who believed in our vision.
author: founder_mike

title: Machine learning in production: lessons learned
content: Deploying ML models to production is vastly different from training them in notebooks. We encountered challenges with data drift, model versioning, and monitoring that required new infrastructure. Here's our journey and what we learned.
author: ml_engineer_jane

title: Design system evolution at scale
content: How we scaled our design system from a single product to serving 15+ teams across the company. Managing component versions, documentation, and adoption was the real challenge.
author: design_lead

title: My journey from bootcamp to first tech job
content: After 12 weeks at a coding bootcamp, I landed my first job as a junior developer. Here's what helped me stand out and what I wish I had known earlier. The learning doesn't stop after graduation!
author: junior_dev_tom

title: Database indexing: when and how
content: Understanding database indexing is crucial for performance. While indexes speed up reads, they slow down writes. Learn how to identify which columns to index and the trade-offs involved.
author: db_expert

title: API design patterns that scale
content: Building APIs that can scale from thousands to millions of requests requires thoughtful design. RESTful principles are good, but GraphQL and gRPC offer different trade-offs worth considering.
author: arch_guru

title: Work-life balance in tech: myth or reality?
author: wellness_advocate

title: Docker best practices for development
content: Using Docker in development environments requires different considerations than production. Here are battle-tested practices that speed up development cycles and reduce 'works on my machine' issues.
author: devops_pro

title: Accessibility in modern web applications
content: Accessibility isn't an afterthought. Building inclusive experiences from day one ensures your application works for everyone. WCAG 2.1 guidelines provide excellent standards to follow.
author: a11y_champion

title: What's the future of frontend development?
author: future_thinker
